import React,{useState} from 'react' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" function Shop(props) { const [state,setState]=useState(0) const handleClick=()=>{ setState(state+1) } return (
{props.paltar.map((index,key)=>

{index.dressName}

{index.price}AZN



) }
) } export default Shop
